name: 陳明彥
objective:
課程藉由公司的實務經驗，來協助同學了解業界實際的產品開發流程與公司運作實務，課程內容將包括市場定位、市場分析、產品規劃、產品設計、專案進行、製造、行銷、銷售、客戶服務等。本課程將提供同學對於產品開發過程與產品生命週期的全盤學習過程，同學亦可藉此了解一個跨國企業的實際運作情形。授課內容並搭配實案例的分享與專案演練，來引導學生結合學術理論基礎及業界實務操作，以協助同學未來於職場工作無縫銜接。
This lecture will try to help students learn more about technology product development and actual enterprise operating processes through Advantech's vast industrial experience which includes market research & analysis, product planning & design, manufacturing, and customer services. From this lecture students will not only get a better understanding of how a global enterprise operates, but also gain a clearer idea of how a newly developed product is developed by looking at its product life cycle. Practical cases will also be shared so as to describe and compare the methodology with the real experience. Through a better understanding of a global enterprise's operation, it is hoped this knowledge will enlighten participants and speed up their progress in their future career path.
schedule:
第  一  週 (Week 1)：產品開發流程簡介 (Introduction to the product development process)
第  二  週 (Week 2)：產品開發流程 (The product development process)
第  三  週 (Week 3)：市場調查與需求分析 (Marketing and requirement analysis)
第  四  週 (Week 4)：概念形成與產品開發計畫 (Product concept and the product development plan)
第  五  週 (Week 5)：專案管理導論 I (Project management I)
第  六  週 (Week 6)：專案管理導論 II (Project management II)
第  七  週 (Week 7)：專案管理導論 III (Project management III)
第  八  週 (Week 8)：期中評量 (Midterm exam)
第  九  週 (Week 9)：專案管理導論 IV (Project management IV)
第  十  週 (Week 10)：專案管理導論 V (Project management V)
第十一週 (Week 11)：專案管理導論 VI (Project management VI)
第十二週 (Week 12)：專案管理案例分享 (Project management cases)
第十三週 (Week 13)：產品失效模式與影響分析 I (Product failure and effect analysis I)
第十四週 (Week 14)：產品失效模式與影響分析 II (Product faulure and effect analysis II)
第十五週 (Week 15)：試產與量產 (Pre-run production and mass production) 
第十六週 (Week 16)：研發管理與技術地圖 (Development management and technology roadmap)
第十七週 (Week 17)：新年元旦假期 (New Year vacation)
第十八週 (Week 18)：期末評量 (Final exam)
